entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • solutioncrawler.workcoordinatortests.additionaldocumentopenedclosedevents is flaky #66658
  • False-positive for IDE0059 when using a variable in an async local function #66657
  • Visual Studio 17.4 Incorrect Enforcing of New Breaking Change in Earlier C# Versions #66646
  • CSharpSyntaxRewriter recursive evaluation does not support lengthy chained binary expressions #66640
  • C# refactoring "Move type to new file" generates file violating stylecop rule SA1505 #66639
  • Suboptimal codegen for local async method #66638
  • EnumUnderlyingType is NULL when calling Complation.GetTypeByMetadataName() on any Enum defined in a MetadataReference. #66631

Closed

  • IDE0019 "use pattern matching" introduces nullable warnings #37875
    Backlog
  • Generic extension does not have lambda intellisense. #33469
    Backlog
  • VS 16.2.3 - IDE0044 CodeFix Removes Whitespace #38468
    Backlog
  • Create and assign field/property should recognize tuple initializer pattern #49107
    Backlog
  • Converting from if to switch removes comments #41131
    Backlog
  • ITypeSymbolExtensions.FindImplementationsForInterfaceMemberAsync uses CPU inefficiently #36538
    Backlog
  • System.ArgumentException: Not a C# symbol. #37333
    Backlog
  • IDE0016 loses comments #38102
    Backlog
  • TypeInferrer should look at future occurrences of variables to determine what type to infer: #44861
    Backlog
  • IDE0032 is incorrectly suggested for pointer fields used with address-of operator #38286
    Backlog
  • Use Implicit Type does not work for 'ref' locals #41780
    Backlog
  • ExtractMethodCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error #55411
    17.6 P2
  • Go to definition (F12) doesn't work when a local variable is selected in the editor (C#) #43183
    Backlog
  • Task List (C#), find "TODO" etc even when in para's #39360
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: Wrong return type when automatically creating a method for an if-statement #47153
    Backlog
  • Codelens doesnt count event handlers as references in VB #46214
    Backlog
  • Nullable value type receiver of a constrained call is unexpectedly copied #66162
    17.5
  • Warning CS4014 not triggered on async methods behind an interface within an Action or Func<> #64964
    C# 12.0
  • IDE0064: False positive when all readonly fields of a struct are static #57920
    Backlog
  • Refactor "Remove parameter" mistakenly removes arguments with '@' #66547
    17.6
  • INvalidOperationException from VisualBasicMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider #66489
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce copies in shadow load #66662
    Area-Compilers
  • Preserve refkind when converting local function to method #66661
    Area-IDE
  • Preserve spacing on trivia for invert if #66660
    Area-IDE
  • Support goto def to a Dispose method when on a 'using' statement #66659
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid directory enumerations in DeleteLeftoverDirectories #66656
    Area-Analyzers
  • Targeting IDE projects to .NET 6 #66655
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid compacting TransformNode's state table #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle all placeholders in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #66641
    Area-Compilers
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • [17.5] Add `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` #66636
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert language-specific option types to records #66633
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not offer to use pattern matching when it would break in a nullable context #66652
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 17.4 Servicing: Fix null ref in change signature #66606
    Area-IDE
  • 17.4 servicing: Fix issue where Solution-Explorer symbol nodes collapse after a… #66605
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66634
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Preserve comments better when converting an if to a switch #66648
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve leading trivia when making a field readonly #66649
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve trivia when converting throw-statement to throw-expr #66651
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support adding to a tuple-assignment if that's the form the user currently has. #66630
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add test showing issue doesn't repro #66647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer 'use auto prop' on pointers we take the address of #66650
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve type-inferrer results by looking at future usages of a variable. #66644
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix reading default values in IVisualStudioStorageReadFallback implementations #66599
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support inference in a single-line vb if-statement #66642
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix goto-def when the user has a selection in the code. #66645
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ignore Razor design time documents for CompileTimeSolution #66632
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Warn for calls in top-level statements that could be awaited #66571
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Snap 17.6 Preview 1 #66613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix issue where we were errantly offering to make static fields writable #66623
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change Signature - Fix 'remove parameter' removing arguments with '@' #66628
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix "MoveStaticMembers" for VB with invalid member #66629
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66664
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers, DemoContent
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers
  • Test/implement more aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66583
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix extraction inside anonymous function #66158
    Area-IDE
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers
  • Continued analyzer assembly loading work #66612
    Area-Compilers
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.6
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
